scripts.clean: npx lerna clean -y && npx lerna exec -- "tsc --build --clean && rimraf dist package-lock.json"
scripts.bootstrap: npx lerna bootstrap && npx lerna link
scripts.postelectron:build:deps: npx lerna exec --scope=@compx/electron_app -- "mkdir -p dist/renderer/loader && mkdir -p dist/renderer/app" && npx lerna exec --scope=@compx/electron_loader -- "cp -R dist/ ../electron_app/dist/renderer/loader/" && npx lerna exec --scope=@compx/web_app -- "cp -R dist/ ../electron_app/dist/renderer/app/"
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:build:deps && npx lerna run --scope=@compx/electron_app build
scripts.electron:start: npm run electron:build && npx lerna run --scope=@compx/electron_app start --stream
scripts.pretest:pretty: npx prettier --write --ignore-path .gitignore $(git diff --name-only HEAD | grep -E '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$' | xargs)
